src package¶

Submodules¶

bet module¶

class src.bet.Bet(amount, outcome, player=None)¶

Bases: object

loseAmount()¶

Calculates the Amount lost in a bet.

price()¶

Computes the price for this bet. For most bets, the price is the amount. Subclasses can override this to handle special cases.

setOutcome(outcome)¶

Sets the Outcome for this bet. This has the effect of moving the bet to another Outcome.

winAmount()¶

Calculates the Amount won in a bet in case the Outcome of the Game is favourable.

class src.bet.CommissionBet(amount, outcome, player)¶

Bases: src.bet.Bet

price()¶

There are two variations of commission bets : Buy bets and Lay bets.

A Buy bet is a right bet; it has a numerator greater than or equal to the denominator, the price is 5% of the amount bet. A $20 Buy bet has a price of $21.

A Lay bet is a wrong bet; it has a denominator greater than the numerator, the price is 5% of num/den of the amount. A $30 bet Layed at 2:3 odds has a price of $31, the $30 bet, plus the vig of 5% of $20 payout.

bet1326_betting module¶

class src.bet1326_betting.Craps1326Betting(outcome)¶

Bases: src.betting_strategy.BettingStrategy

Strategy that changes a bet multiplier on winning. Current bet amount is multiplier times current bet amount. The strategy follows the pattern 1-3-2-6. On losing, the pattern resets to 1.

createBet(player)¶
Returns:(Bet) bet constructed based on current state of the game.
lose()¶

calls the nextLost() method of the state class to change the current state of the game.

win()¶

calls the nextWon() method of the state class to change the current state of the game.

betting_strategy module¶

class src.betting_strategy.BettingStrategy(outcome, bet_amount)¶

Bases: object

Abstract class that defines behavior of a betting strategy.

static createBet(self)¶

Each strategy must override this method to implement its own logic to create a bet.

static lose(self)¶

Each strategy must override this method to implement its own logic after a loss.

static win(self)¶

Each strategy must override this method to implement its own logic after a win.

bin_builder module¶

class src.bin_builder.BinBuilder(wheel)¶

Bases: src.bin_builder.IBuilder

Class responsible for setting the wheel with the correct placement of outcomes on appropriate bins

buildBins()¶

Returns wheel built after all the bins

generateColumnBets()¶

Adds outcome for Column bets, Each number is a member of 1 of 3 columns Generate outcomes and assign to bins based on column membership Odds are 2:1

generateCornerBets()¶

Adds outcome for Corner bets, Each number is a member of 1,2 or 4 corner bets. Odds are 8:1

generateDozenBets()¶

Adds outcome for Dozen bets, Each number is a member of 1 of 3 dozens Generate outcomes and assign to bins based on column membership Odds are 2:1

generateEvenMoneyBets()¶

Adds outcome for even money bets, These include high, low, even, odd, red, black. Odds are 1:1

generateLineBets()¶

Adds outcomes for line bets 6 consecutive numbers comprise a line Each number is a member of 1 or 2 lines Odds are 5:1

generateSpecialBets()¶

Adds outcome for bins 0,00

generateSplitBets()¶

Adds outcome for split bets, assigns to bins at respective positions on the wheel Each number is adjacent to 2,3 or 4 numbers Generate Split bet outcomes on the basis of the number of sides shared Odds are 17:1

generateStraightBets()¶

Adds outcome for straight bets, assigns to bins at respective positions on the wheel Each number is an outcome with odds 35:1

generateStreetBets()¶

Adds outcome for street bets, Set of every 3 numbers on every row of the table. Total 12 streets with odds of 11:1

craps_game module¶

class src.craps_game.CrapsGame(dice, table)¶

Bases: src.game.Game

Implementation of the general game interface for the game of craps.

cycle(player)¶

simulates a single round of single player craps 1 player places its bets 2 game fetches the winning outcomes from a single thriow of the dice 3 game updates its own state based on the throw and updates player balances based on the outcome being a winning or losing outcome. 4 game resolves the hardway and one way propositions if any.

Parameters:player – (Passenger57)
isValid(outcome)¶
Returns:(Boolean) whether or not the outcome is valid for a given game state.
moveToThrow(bet, throw)¶

change the outcome of a line bet to a corresponding outcome from a throw object when the state of the game changes from come out roll to point roll.

Parameters:
  • bet – (Bet) bet to be changed.
  • throw – (Throw) throw event used to assign new outcomes.
reset()¶

chaneges the state back to the initial come out state.

craps_game_state module¶

class src.craps_game_state.CrapsGamePointOff(game)¶

Bases: src.craps_game_state.CrapsGameState

CrapsGamePointOff defines the behavior of the Craps game when the point is off. It defines the allowed bets and the active bets. It provides methods used by a Throw to change the state and resolve bets.

craps(throw)¶

When the point is off, a roll of 2, 3 or 12 means the game is an immediate loser. The Pass Line Outcome is a loset. If the Throw value is 12, a Don’t Pass Line Outcome is a push, otherwise the Don’t Pass Line Outcome is a winner. The next state is the same as this state, and the method should return this.

eleven(throw)¶

When the point is off, 11 means the game is an immediate winner. The Pass Line Outcome is a winner, the Don’t Pass Line Outcome is a loser. The next state is the same as this state, and the method should return this.

isValid(outcome)¶

There are two valid Outcomes: Pass Line, Don’t Pass Line. All other Outcomes are invalid.

isWorking(outcome)¶

There are six non-working Outcomes: “Come Odds 4”, “Come Odds 5”, “Come Odds 6”, “Come Odds 8”, “Come Odds 9” and “Come Odds 10”. All other Outcomes are working

natural(throw)¶

When the point is off, 7 means the game is an immediate winner. The Pass Line Outcome is a winner, the Don’t Pass Line Outcome is a loser. The next state is the same as this state, and the method should return this.

point(throw)¶

When the point is off, a new point is established. This method should return a new instance of CrapsGame PointOn created with the given Throw‘s value. Note that any Come Point bets or Don’t Come Point bets that may be on this point are pushed to player: they can’t be legal bets in the next game state.

pointOutcome()¶

Returns the Outcome based on the current point. This is used to create Pass Line Odds or Don’t Pass Odds bets. This delegates the real work to the current CrapsGameState object. Since no point has been established, this returns null.

class src.craps_game_state.CrapsGamePointOn(point, game)¶

Bases: src.craps_game_state.CrapsGameState

CrapsGamePointOn defines the behavior of the Craps game when the point is on. It defines the allowed bets and the active bets. It provides methods used by a Throw to change the state and resolve bets.

craps(throw)¶

When the point is on, 2, 3 and 12 do not change the game state. The Come Line Outcome is a loser, the Don’t Come Line Outcome is a winner. The next state is the same as this state, and the method should return this.

eleven(throw)¶

When the point is on, 11 does not change the game state. The Come Line Outcome is a winner, and the Don’t Come Line Outcome is a loser. The next state is the same as this state, and the method should return this.

isValid(outcome)¶

It is invalid to Buy or Lay the Outcomes that match the point. If the point is 6, for example, it is invalid to buy the “Come Point 6” Outcome. All other Outcomes are valid.

isWorking(outcome)¶

All Outcomes are working

natural(throw)¶

When the point is on, 7 means the game is a loss. Pass Line Outcomes lose, as do the pass-line odds Outcome s based on the point. Don’t Pass Line Outcomes win, as do all Don’t Pass odds Outcome based on the point. The Come Line Outcome is a winner, the Don’t Come Line Outcome is a loser. However, all Come Point number Outcomes and Come Point Number odds Outcome are all losers. All Don’t Come Point number Outcomes and Don’t Come Point odds Outcomes are all winners. The next state is a new instance of the CrapsGamePointOff state.

point(throw)¶

When the point is on and the value of throw doesn’t match point, then the various Come Line bets can be resolved. Come Point Outcome s for this number (and their odds) are winners. Don’t Come Line Outcome s for this number (and their odds) are losers. Other Come Point number and Don’t Come Point numbers remain, unresolved. Any Come Line bets are moved to the Come Point number Outcomes.

When the point is on and the value of throw matches point, the game is a winner. Pass Line Outcomes are all winners, as are the behind the line odds Outcomes. Don’t Pass line Outcomes are all losers, as are the Don’t Pass Odds Outcomes. Come Line bets are moved to thee Come Point number Outcomes. Don’t Come Line bets are moved to be Don’t Come number Outcomes. The next state is a new instance of the CrapsGamePointOff state.

pointOutcome()¶
class src.craps_game_state.CrapsGameState(game)¶

Bases: object

CrapsGameState defines the state-specific behavior of a Craps game. Individual subclasses provide methods used by CrapsTable to validate bets and determine the active bets. Subclasses provide state-specific methods used by a Throw to possibly change the state and resolve bets.

craps(throw)¶
eleven(throw)¶
isValid(outcome)¶
isWorking(outcome)¶
moveToThrow(bet, throw)¶

Moves a Come Line or Don’t Come Line bet to a new Outcome based on the current throw. If the value of theThrow is 4, 5, 6, 8, 9 or 10, this delegates the move to the current CrapsGameState object. For values of 4 and 10, the odds are 2:1. For values of 5 and 9, the odds are 3:2. For values of 6 and 8, the odds are 6:5. For other values of theThrow, this method does nothing.

natural(throw)¶
point(throw)¶
pointOutcome()¶

craps_onebetplayer module¶

class src.craps_onebetplayer.OneBetPlayer(table, strategy)¶

Bases: src.craps_player.CrapsSimplePlayer

Player that places a single bet on the table. A Pass Line/Dont Pass Line bet when the point is off.

lose(bet)¶

matches the losing parameter outcome with the line outcome and calls the loss method of the line strategy. leaves the stake adjustment to ancestors.

Parameters:bet – (Bet)
oddsBet()¶

override this method to configure odds bet strategy

placeBets(point)¶

places a bet if the player is ready to play another round and has enough in its stake to place the bet. if its a come out roll, then places a line bet if not already present. places no bet if the roll is a point roll.

Parameters:point – (integer) point on the board after the throw.
win(bet)¶

matches the winning parameter outcome with the line outcome and calls the win method of the line strategy. leaves the stake adjustment to ancestors.

Parameters:bet – (Bet)

craps_sevencountplayer module¶

class src.craps_sevencountplayer.CrapsSevenCountPlayer(table, line_strategy, odds_strategy, seven_strategy)¶

Bases: src.craps_twobetplayer.CrapsTwoBetPlayer

Player that places 3 bets on the table. 1. A Pass Line/Dont Pass Line bet when the point is off. 2. A Pass Line Odds/Dont Pass Line odds bet when the point is on. 3. A Number 7 proposition bet if the game lasts longer than 7 rounds.

lose(bet)¶

matches the losing parameter outcome with the outcome and calls the loss method of the seven strategy. leaves the line and odds bet resolutions and stake adjustment to ancestors.

Parameters:bet – (Bet)
placeBets(point)¶

places a bet if the player is ready to play another round and has enough in its stake to place the bet. if its a come out roll, then places a line bet if not already present. if its a point roll, then places an odds bet. if the game lasts longer than 7 rounds, then places a number 7 proposition bet.

Parameters:point – (integer) point on the board after the throw.
win(bet)¶

matches the winning parameter outcome with the seven strategy outcome and calls the win method of the seven strategy. leaves the line and odds bet resolutions and stake adjustment to ancestors.

Parameters:bet – (Bet)

craps_twobetplayer module¶

class src.craps_twobetplayer.CrapsTwoBetPlayer(table, line_strategy, odds_strategy)¶

Bases: src.craps_onebetplayer.OneBetPlayer

Player that places 2 bets on the table. 1. A Pass Line/Dont Pass Line bet when the point is off. 2. A Pass Line Odds/Dont Pass Line odds bet when the point is on.

lose(bet)¶

matches the losing parameter outcome with the odds outcome and calls the loss method of the odds strategy. leaves the line bet resolution and stake adjustment to ancestors.

oddsBet()¶

overrides the simple craps player odds method to implement logic for placing the odds bet.

win(bet)¶

matches the winning parameter outcome with the odds outcome and calls the win method of the odds strategy. leaves the line bet resolution and stake adjustment to ancestors.

Parameters:bet – (Bet)

dice module¶

class src.dice.Dice¶

Bases: src.random_event_factory.RandomEventFactory

Two Dice are rolled on every cycle of the game. Dice stop at a random set of numbers between 1 and 6, Thus its a collectioin of throws.

addThrow(throw)¶

Adds the given Throw to the mapping maintained by this instance of Dice. The key for this Throw is available from the Throw.getKey() method.

Parameters:throw – (Throw)
getThrow(d1, d2)¶

This method takes a particular combination of dice, locates (or creates) a NumberPair, and returns the appropriate Throw.

Parameters:
  • d1 – (int) Number on the 1st die
  • d2 – (int) Number on the 2nd die
Returns:

(Throw) Throw correspoding to the input dice numbers
initialize()¶

Initializes the random event factory with appropriate outcome of random events.

next()¶

First, get the list of keys from the throws. The random.Random.choice() method will select one of the available keys from the the list. This is used to get the corresponding Throw from the throws Map.

Returns:(Throw) randomly selected Throw.

main module¶

martingale_betting module¶

class src.martingale_betting.MartingaleBetting(outcome)¶

Bases: src.betting_strategy.BettingStrategy

Betting strategy which doubles the betting amount after each loss to recover the amount lost.

createBet(player)¶

multiplies current amount with the multiplier which is equal to 2 ** number of losses.

Returns:(Bet) bet as a result of updated bet amount.
lose()¶

increments the loss count by 1 after each loss

win()¶

resets the loss count back to 0 after each win

Calculates the win amount in case of a favourable outcome
winningAmount = betamount * odds
Parameters:amount – (numeric) amount bet on the outcome
Returns:(numeric) amount won
class src.outcome.OutcomeField(name, odds)¶

Bases: src.outcome.Outcome

Class to handle special case where the odds of the outcome depends on the sum of the throw. In case of field outcome, if sum of the dice is 2 or 12 then the odds are 2:1 otherwise its 1:1

winAmount(amount, throw)¶

Calculates the winning amount according to the odds associated with the sum of dice numbers fo the throw event passed as input.

Parameters:
  • amount – (numeric) Amount bet on the field outcome
  • throw – (Throw)
class src.outcome.OutcomeHorn(name, odds)¶

Bases: src.outcome.Outcome

Class to handle special case where the odds of the outcome depends on the sum of the throw.

odds are 27:4 otherwise its 3:1

winAmount(amount, throw)¶

Calculates the winning amount according to the odds associated with the sum of dice numbers fo the throw event passed as input.

Parameters:
  • amount – (numeric) Amount bet on the horn outcome
  • throw – (Throw)

roulette1326 module¶

class src.roulette1326.Roulette1326(table, wheel)¶

Bases: src.roulette_player.RoulettePlayer

Player that changes the multiplier on winning. The strategy follows the pattern 1-3-2-6. On losing, the pattern resets.

lose()¶

Calls the superclass method to perform monetary adjustment. Moves the current game to next appropriate state.

placeBets()¶

places a bet based on the current state of the game. i.e. number of wins and deducts the amount from the stake.

win(bet)¶

Calls the superclass method to perform monetary adjustment. Moves the current game to next appropriate state.

Parameters:bet –

roulette_cancellation module¶

class src.roulette_cancellation.RouletteCancellation(wheel, table)¶

Bases: src.roulette_player.RoulettePlayer

PlayerCancellation uses the cancellation betting system. This player allocates their available budget into a sequence of bets that have an accelerating potential gain as well as recouping any losses.

lose()¶

Uses the superclass method to update the stake with an amount lost. It then appends the sum of the first and list elements of sequence to the end of sequence as a new Integer value.

placeBets()¶

Creates a bet from the sum of the first and last values of sequence and the preferred outcome.

playing()¶
Returns:(Boolean) whether or not player is ready to play the next round.
resetSequence()¶

Puts the initial sequence of six Integer instances into the sequence variable. These Integers are built from the values 1 through 6.

win(bet)¶

Uses the superclass method to update the stake with an amount won. It then removes the fist and last element from sequence.

Parameters:bet – (Bet) winning bet

roulette_fibonacci module¶

class src.roulette_fibonacci.RouletteFibonacci(wheel, table)¶

Bases: src.roulette_player.RoulettePlayer

PlayerFibonacci uses the Fibonacci betting system. This player allocates their available budget into a sequence of bets that have an accelerating potential gain.

lose()¶

This will go “forwards” in the sequence. It updates recent and previous as follows.

placeBets()¶

Places and even money bet based on amount as per fibonacci betting strategy. Deducts bet amount from player’s stake.

playing()¶

whether or not a player is ready to play the next round.

win(bet)¶

resets current and previous to their initial values of 1 and 0

Parameters:bet – (Bet) winning bet

roulette_martingale module¶

class src.roulette_martingale.RouletteMartingale(table, wheel)¶

Bases: src.roulette_player.RoulettePlayer

Roulette player which follows martingale strategy. Tries to make up for a loss by doubling the bet amount.

lose()¶

Increments loss count by 1. Leaves the stake adjustment to the super class.

placeBets()¶

Calculates the bet multiplier based on the number of consecutive loses encountered. Places an even money bet on the table. Deducts Bet amount from player balance.

win(bet)¶

Resets loss count back to initial state of 0. Leaves the stake adjustment to the super class.

roulette_seven_reds module¶

class src.roulette_seven_reds.RouletteSevenReds(table, wheel)¶

Bases: src.roulette_martingale.RouletteMartingale

SevenReds is a Martingale player who places bets in Roulette. This player waits until the wheel has spun red seven times in a row before betting black.

placeBets()¶

If redCount is zero, this places a bet on black, using the bet multiplier.

winners(winning_outcomes)¶

This is notification from the Game of all the winning outcomes. If this vector includes red, redCount is decremented. Otherwise, redCount is reset to 7

Parameters:winning_outcomes – (Outcome)

simulator module¶

class src.simulator.Simulator(game, player, stake=100, init_duration=250, samples=50)¶

Bases: object

Class which simualtes Sessions of game play. It initialises the various components and stores the results after running a session of multiple cycles of play.

gather()¶

Executes the number of game sessions in samples. Every session returns the duration and the maximum stake value in the session. These two metrics are appended to the durations list and the maxima list. The durations and maxima lists are printed on stdout.

session(debug=False)¶

One or more cycles. The session begins with a player having their full stake. A session ends when the play elects to leave or can no longer participate.

table module¶

class src.table.Table(minimum, maximum)¶

Bases: object

Table is responsible for holding a list of bets made by the player. A Table has a minimum and maximum limit on sum total of amount which a player can bet at a time.

allValid()¶

Validates the sum of all bets within the table limits. Returns false if the minimum is not met or the maximum is exceeded.

clear()¶

Clear the game table, Useful if game needs to restart.

isValid(bet)¶

Validates this bet. The first test, checks test to see if the bet is valid.

placeBet(bet)¶

Player can call this method to place a bet on the Table. Multiple bets can be placed by calling multiple method multiple times.

setGame(game)¶

Saves the given game to be used to validate bets

class src.throw.Throw(d1, d2, winners=[], losers=[])¶

Bases: src.random_event.RandomEvent

Throw is a collection of outcomes. It resembles outcomes from 1 throw of a dice.

add1Roll(winners, losers)¶

Adds outcomes to the one-roll winners and one-roll losers Sets.

Parameters:
  • winners – (set) All the outcomes which will be paid as winners for this Throw.
  • losers – (set) All the outcomes which will be considered as losers for this Throw.
addHardways(winners, losers)¶

Adds outcomes to the hardway winners and hardway losers Sets.

Parameters:
  • winners – (set) All the outcomes which will be paid as winners for this Throw.
  • losers – (set) All the outcomes which will be considered as losers for this Throw.
getKey()¶
hard()¶
Returns:(boolean) whether or not throw was a hard throw
resolveHardways(bet)¶

pay the player if the bet is in the hardway winners set. return true to indicate the bet must be removed from the table if the bet is present in either hardway outcomes.

Parameters:bet – The bet to to be resolved
Returns:(boolean)
resolveOneRoll(bet)¶

pay the player if the bet is in the one roll winners set. return true to indicate the bet must be removed from the table if the bet is present in either one roll outcomes.

Parameters:bet – The bet to to be resolved
Returns:(boolean)
updateGame(game)¶

method responsible for resolving multiple roll propositions and causing appropriate state change of the game.

throw_builder module¶

class src.throw_builder.CrapsGameOdds¶

Bases: object

A class representing the odds of various bets in craps

anyCraps = 8¶
field = 1.25¶
hardway = {2: 1, 4: 2, 6: 3, 8: 3, 10: 4}¶
horn = 3.75¶
straight = {2: 31, 3: 16, 7: 5, 11: 16, 12: 31}¶
class src.throw_builder.DiceDirector¶

Bases: object

The director class for the dice, building a complex representation

static construct(self)¶

Constructs and returns the dice with all the outcomes

class src.throw_builder.IBuilder¶

Bases: object

static buildThrows()¶

Returns wheel built after all the bins

static generateAnyCrapsThrows()¶

Adds outcome for Any Craps throws,

static generateFieldThrows()¶
Adds outcome for field throws, Odds are 17:1

In case of field outcome, if sum of the dice is 2 or 12 then the odds are 2:1 otherwise its 1:1

static generateHardwayThrows()¶

Adds outcome for Harway throws,

static generateHornThrows()¶
Adds outcome for Horn throws,
In case of horn outcome, if sum of the dice is 2 or 12 then the
odds are 27:4 otherwise its 3:1
static generateStraightThrows()¶

Adds outcome for straight throws, Each number is an outcome with odds 1:1

class src.throw_builder.ThrowBuilder(dice)¶

Bases: src.throw_builder.IBuilder

Class responsible for setting the wheel with the correct placement of outcomes on appropriate bins

buildThrows()¶

Returns wheel built after all the bins

generateAnyCrapsThrows()¶

Adds outcome for Any Craps throws,

generateFieldThrows()¶
Adds outcome for field throws,
Odds are 17:1

In case of field outcome, if sum of the dice is 2 or 12 then the odds are 2:1 otherwise its 1:1

generateHardwayThrows()¶

Adds outcome for Harway throws,

generateHornThrows()¶

Adds outcome for Horn throws, In case of horn outcome, if sum of the dice is 2 or 12 then the

odds are 27:4 otherwise its 3:1
generateStraightThrows()¶

Adds outcome for straight throws, Each number is an outcome with odds 1:1

wheel module¶

class src.wheel.Wheel¶

Bases: src.random_event_factory.RandomEventFactory

Wheel contains the 38 bins present on a roulette wheel and a random number generator. Thus, It can select a bin at random, simulating the spin of a roulette wheel.

addOutcome(number, outcome)¶

Adds the given outcome to the bin with the given number.

Parameters:
  • bin – (int)
  • outcome – (Outcome)
get(number)¶
Parameters:bin – (int)
Returns:(Bin)
getOutcome(name)¶

Getter to fecth Outcome Object from the map of Outcomes

Parameters:name – (str)
Returns:(Outcome)
initialize()¶

Initializes the random event factory with appropriate outcome of random events.

next()¶

Generates a random number between 0 and 37 with replacement, and returns the randomly selected bin there by simulating a spin of the roulette wheel

Returns:(Bin)
